abstract: Despite JPMorgan Chase‘s generous and carefully constructed deal to buy the rest of Cazenove, it may not be able to preserve the historic firm’s legacy, Breakingviews says.
snippet: Despite JPMorgan Chase‘s generous and carefully constructed deal to buy the rest of Cazenove, it may not be able to preserve the historic firm’s legacy, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: After 185 years on its own and five in shared accommodations, Cazenove, the British stockbroker, is moving into the House of Morgan.
